Html:
A little help please if possible.
Using build 3.0.8.1 in asp.net web page.

I am sending a 270. The 271 response has an error on the DMG line for the Subscriber.
They are sending back DMGD8*M for the subscriber loop (no date).

When I try to load the response into an EligibilityBenefitDocument, it throws and error and won't load the document.

Error: There is an error in XML document (14, 31).

My code is:
Dim EBService = New Eligibility.Services.EligibilityTransformationService()
Try
Dim EBDocument As Eligibility.EligibilityBenefitDocument = EBService.Transform271ToBenefitResponse(stream)
EBDocument.EligibilityBenefitResponses = EBDocument.EligibilityBenefitResponses
Is there a method/parameter where I can continue to load the document even if it contains an error like this (or other errors)?

Thanks in advance.
John
